page.title: 12LIFE IN YEADING
page.content: We enjoy living in Yeading because lots of things happen. In July each year we have a{carnival.}People dress up in different clothes and decorate vehicles. Then they drive around the streets to let everyone see how beautiful they look. All the floats collect together at Hayes Sports ground to be judged. Each year we have a{fair.}It is very exciting going to the fair because it is bright and colourful. It makes you laugh and cry, because part of it is frightening. Each year the willows school invites other schools to their{summer fete. Thry play lots of games and we win lots of prizes. St Edmunds has a big {jumble sale}outside the church every year. So you can see life in Yeading is very interesting.
